about_the_game:
Venture into the depths of the fog with this Haunted Swamp tileset for RPG Maker and more! Will the haunted trees guide your players or trick them into a terrible fate?

This Haunted Swamp Tileset Includes (in bright, gray and muddy color palettes):

Ground Tiles:

Dark, spooky water that could be hiding nearly anything
Muted, foggy ground textures that blend into each other…
…and also the fog. Two fog densities included.
Wood floors and rugs
Grasses, lilypads, and other swampy growth
and more!

Walls:

Includes reed, thatch, and wood roofs (with bonus shadow-side tiles) plus angled roofs for advanced construction!
Thick hay wall
Braided rope wall
Wood panel wall
Dark stone (with matching grass)
Woven wall
Hedge wall

Also includes:

Fog overlays to make your swamps even spookier!
Stairs to match many ground tiles
Dark stone cliff-building tiles
Matching boulders, some designed to sit in the water (with trees on top)
Lots of bushes, ferns, leafy plants
Lilypads! Big enough to walk on. Cut paths across bodies of water with huge lilypads, flowers, and lotus pods.
Cattails (more designs added!)
Bridges (hanging rope bridge, pier, and bridge with posts in water).
Ladders and climbing ropes (some broken)
Lots of spooky trees! You get both plain skeleton trees, plus a version with spooky faces, leaves and faded roots (for water use). Designed so you can swap pieces between the two sets and customize further.
Interior tiles – buckets, baskets, diagonal stairs, cleaning tools, new cabinets, fireplace, brand new beds (in canopy and plain design) plus overlay wall paneling
and more!


Events and Animations

Flames of various sizes
Barrel and crate (open to be used like treasure chests)
Doors (lit and unlit)
Waterfall mist in several sizes and types
